Styra Link intro.description: Introductory remarks on rego, Styra Link, and VSCode
body: # Welcome to the world of rego!
# The VSCode plugin provides a wealth of ready-made snippets to jump start your rego journey.
# Note that whether you have any snippets depends on the system type of the DAS system
# that you have connected to your currently loaded VSCode project with Styra Link.
# Use the "Styra Link: Initialize" command to set that up if you you have not already.

Example: conjunction of rules.description: Illustrates how to write a rule where all expressions must be satisfied

Example: disjunction of rules.description: Illustrates how to write a rule where only one expression must be satisfied
